p: Demographic characteristics of the 426 chicken farmers included in the study are presented in Table 1. Of the respondents, 25.1% had previous experience of chickens being infected with A/H5N1. Medium-scale farms were the most common in the study, with 56.6% of farms rearing between 1001 and 10,000 chickens and 21.8% with more than 10,000.
